solution_line_template: Samson ate {sandwiches_lunch_monday} sandwiches x {dinner_multiplier} = <<{sandwiches_lunch_monday}*{dinner_multiplier}={sandwiches_dinner_monday}>>{sandwiches_dinner_monday} sandwiches at dinner on Monday

He ate {sandwiches_lunch_monday} sandwiches + {sandwiches_dinner_monday} sandwiches = <<{sandwiches_lunch_monday}+{sandwiches_dinner_monday}={sandwiches_monday_total}>>{sandwiches_monday_total} sandwiches total on Monday
Therefore, he ate {sandwiches_monday_total} sandwiches - {sandwiches_tuesday_breakfast} sandwich = {difference} more sandwiches on Monday than Tuesday
